net.rptools.CaseInsensitiveHashMap_-KeyV.value: [{"sName":"Skirmish","sCost":"1+","sDesc":"You can move yourself or the target of your attack 2 yards in any direction for every 1 SP you spend."},{"sName":"Rapid Reload", "sCost":1,"sDesc":"You can immediately reload a missile weapon."},{"sName":"Knock Prone","sCost":2,"sDesc":"You knock your enemy prone. Any character making a melee attack against a prone foe gains +1 bonus on the attack roll."},{"sName":"Defensive Stance","sCost":2,"sDesc":"Your attack sets you up for defense. You gain a +2 bonus to Defense until the beginning of your next turn."},{"sName":"Disarm","sCost":2,"sDesc":"You attempt to disarm the target with your melee attack. You and your opponent must make an opposed attack roll. These attack rolls do not generate stunt points. If you win the test, you knock your enemy's weapon 1d6+Strength yards away in a direction you nominate."},{"sName":"Mighty Blow","sCost":2,"sDesc":"You inflict an extra 1d6 damage on your attack."},{"sName":"Pierce Armor","sCost":2,"sDesc":"You find a chink in your enemy's armor. His armor rating is halved (round down) versus this attack."},{"sName":"Lightning Attack","sCost":3,"sDesc":"You can make a second attack against the same enemy or a different one within range and sight. You must have a loaded missile weapon to make a ranged attack. If you roll doubles on this attack roll, you do not gain any more stunt points."},{"sName":"Dual Strike","sCost":4,"sDesc":"Your attack is so strong it affects two targets. First, pick a secondary target. He must be adjacent to you if you are using a melee weapon or within 6 yards of your primary target if you are using a missile weapon. Apply the test result of your original attack roll to the secondary target (in other words, you only make one attack roll and apply it to both opponents). If you hit the secondary target, infict your normal damage on him."},{"sName":"Seize the Initiative","sCost":4,"sDesc":"Your attack changes the tempo of the battle. You move to the top of the initiative order. This means you may get to take another turn before some of the combatants get to act again. You remain at the top of the order until someone else seizes the initiative."}]
Arcane Lore,Cartography,Cultural Lore,Engineering,Evaluation,Healing,Heraldry,Historical Lore,Military Lore,Musical Lore,Natural Lore,Navigation,Research,Religious Lore,Writing

[{"sName":"Puissant Casting","sCost":"1-3","sDesc":"Increase the Spellpower of your spell by 1 per stunt point spent, to a maximum of 3."},{"sName":"Skillful Casting","sCost":2,"sDesc":"Reduce the mana cost of the spell by 1. This can reduce the mana cost to 0."},{"sName":"Mighty Spell","sCost":2,"sDesc":"If the spell does damage, one target of the spell of your choice takes an extra d6 damage."},{"sName":"Mana Shield","sCost":3,"sDesc":"You use the residual mana of the spell casting to set up a temporary protective shield. You gain a +2 bonus to Defense until the beginning of your next turn."},{"sName":"Fast Casting","sCost":4,"sDesc":"After you resolve this spell, you can immediately cast another spell. The second spell must have a casting time of a major action or a minor action. If you roll doubles on this casting roll, you do not get any more stunt points."},{"sName":"Imposing Spell","sCost":4,"sDesc":"The effect of the spell is much more dramatic than usual. Until the beginning of your next turn, anyone attempting to make a melee attack against you must make a successful Willpower (Courage) test. The target number (TN) is 10 + your Magic ability. Those who fail must take a move or defend action instead."}]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: UpdateArmor

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h,if(json.isEmpty(ArmorOwned)): mpList = ""; mpList = json.fields(ArmorOwned)] [h:mpList = listAppend(mpList, "None")] [h: status = input( ".|Equip Armor||LABEL|SPAN=TRUE", "whichMP|"+mpList+"|Select Armor to Equip|LIST|SELECT=0 VALUE=STRING" )] [h:abort(status)] [h,if(whichMP == "None"),CODE: { [name = "None"] [armorbonus = 0] [penalty = 0] [trained = 0] }; { [mpDetails = json.get(ArmorOwned, whichMP)] [armorbonus = json.get(mpDetails, "ArmorBonus")] [penalty = json.get(mpDetails, "ArmorPenalty")] [trained = json.get(mpDetails, "ArmorTrained")] [name = whichMP] }] [h: Armor = armorbonus] [h: ArmorPenalty = penalty] [h: DexPenalty = if(trained == 0, penalty, 0)] [h: ArmorType = name] [h, macro("SheetLoad@Lib:Test"): ""]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: EquipArmor

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h,if(json.isEmpty(ShieldOwned)): mpList = ""; mpList = json.fields(ShieldOwned)] [h:mpList = listAppend(mpList, "None")] [h: status = input( ".|Equip Shield||LABEL|SPAN=TRUE", "whichMP|"+mpList+"|Select Armor to Equip|LIST|SELECT=0 VALUE=STRING" )] [h:abort(status)] [h,if(whichMP == "None"),CODE: { [name = "None"] [shieldbonus = 0] [trained = 0] }; { [mpDetails = json.get(ShieldOwned, whichMP)] [shieldbonus = json.get(mpDetails, "ShieldBonus")] [trained = json.get(mpDetails, "ShieldTrained")] [name = whichMP] }] [h: shieldNew = if(trained == 0, 1, shieldbonus)] [h: shieldNew = if(name == "None", 0, shieldNew)] [h: Shield = shieldNew] [h: ShieldType = name] [h, macro("SheetLoad@Lib:Test"): ""]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: EquipShield

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: status= input( ".|Health Pop-Up||LABEL|SPAN=TRUE", "type|Damage, Healing, Breather, Sleep|Damage or Healing|LIST", "amount|0|Amount|TEXT")] [h: abort(status)] [h: target=macro.args] [h, Token(target): getProperty("HealthCurrent")] [h, Token(target): getProperty("Constitution")] [h, Token(target): getProperty("Level")] [h, Token(target): getProperty("Health")] [h, Token(target): getProperty("DamageCurrent")] [h: hp=HealthCurrent] [h: math=if(type==0, 0-amount, 0+amount)] [h: math=if(type==2, 5+Constitution+Level, math)] [h: math=if(type==3, 10+Constitution+Level, math)] [h: newhp=hp+math] [h: newhp=if(newhp<0, 0, newhp)] [h: newhp=if(newhp>Health, Health, newhp)] [h: HealthCurrent=newhp] [h: dmg = DamageCurrent] [h: dmgnew = if(type==0, dmg + amount, dmg - amount)] [h: dmgnew = if(dmgnew < 0, 0, dmgnew)] [h: DamageCurrent=dmgnew] [r: if(type==2, "Takes a Breather and", "")] [r: if(type==3, "Takes 8 hours of rest and", "")] [if(type==0),CODE: { Takes [r: amount] damage! }; { Gains [r:math] health. };] [r, macro("SheetLoad@this"): macro.args]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: HealthChange
UpdateShield
UpdateClassTalents

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: status= input( "type|Spend Mana, Regain Mana, Short Rest, 8 hr. Rest|Spend or Regain|LIST|SELECT=0", "amount|0|Amount|TEXT", "hours|0|Hours Rested|TEXT")] [h: abort(status)] [h: target=currentToken()] [h, Token(target): getProperty("ManaCurrent")] [h, Token(target): getProperty("Magic")] [h, Token(target): getProperty("Mana")] [h:hrrest=hours] [h: rollmath = 0] [h, COUNT(hrrest): rollmath = rollmath + 1d6 + Magic] [h: mp=ManaCurrent] [h: math=if(type==0, 0-amount, 0+amount)] [h: math=if(type==2, rollmath, math)] [h: math=if(type==3, Mana, math)] [h: newmp=mp+math] [h: newmp=if(newmp<0, 0, newmp)] [h: newmp=if(newmp>Mana, Mana, newmp)] [h: ManaCurrent=newmp] [r: if(type==3, "Takes 8 hours of rest and ", "")] [if(type>0),CODE: { [if(type==2),CODE: { Takes [r: hours] [r: if(hours ==1, "hour", "hours")] of rest and Regains [r: math] mana. }; { Regains [r: if(type==3, "all", math)] mana. };] }; { Spends [r: amount] mana. }; ] [r, macro("SheetLoad@this"): macro.args]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: ManaChange

(ie. Brawling, Axes, Heavy Blades)|TEXT", "WeaponArmorNotes|"+WeaponArmorNotes+"|Special notes for weapons and armor|TEXT", "tab1 | Abilities || TAB", "Communication|"+Communication+"|Communication|TEXT", "Constitution|"+Constitution+"|Constitution|TEXT", "Cunning|"+Cunning+"|Cunning|TEXT", "DexTotal|"+DexTotal+"|Dexterity|TEXT", "Magic|"+Magic+"|Magic|TEXT", "Perception|"+Perception+"|Perception|TEXT", "Strength|"+Strength+"|Strength|TEXT", "Willpower|"+Willpower+"|Willpower|TEXT", "tab2 | Ability Focus || TAB", "CommFocus|"+CommFocus+"|Communication Focus|TEXT|", "ConFocus|"+ConFocus+"|Constitution Focus|TEXT|", "CunnFocus|"+CunnFocus+"|Cunning Focus|TEXT|", "DexFocus|"+DexFocus+"|Dexterity Focus|TEXT|", "MagFocus|"+MagFocus+"|Magic Focus|TEXT|", "PerFocus|"+PerFocus+"|Perception Focus|TEXT|", "StrFocus|"+StrFocus+"|Strength Focus|TEXT|", "WillFocus|"+WillFocus+"|Willpower Focus|TEXT|", ".|Space multiple focuses with a "+"( , )"+"
(ie. Drinking, Running, Swimming)||LABEL|SPAN=TRUE", "tab3 | Magic || TAB", "Mana|"+Mana+"|Mana|TEXT", "Spellpower|"+Spellpower+"|Spellpower|TEXT" )] [r: token.name] has been updated. [r, macro("SheetLoad@Lib:Test"): macro.args] [h: abort(status)]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: status= input( ".|Dice Roll||LABEL|SPAN=TRUE", "dice|0|Number of Dice|TEXT", "miscPos | 0 | Bonus", "miscNeg | 0 | Penalty", "ability| , Communication, Constitution, Cunning, Dexterity, Magic, Perception, Strength, Willpower|Ability| LIST|SELECT=0 VALUE=STRING" )] [h: abort(status)] [h:abilityValue = if(ability == "", 0, getProperty(ability))] [h: rollmath = 0] [h, COUNT(dice): rollmath = rollmath + 1d6] [h: total = rollmath + abilityValue + miscPos + miscNeg] [h: abilitycheck = if(abilityValue == 0, "", ability)] [h: sign = if(abilitycheck == "", "", "+")] [h: tens = floor(total/10)] [h: tens = if(total > 9, tens, 0)] [h: subt = (tens * 10)] [h: ones = (total - subt)] [h: Img1 = tblImage("Totaltens", tens)] [h: Img2 = tblImage("Total", ones)] Rolls [r: dice]d6[r: sign][r: abilitycheck]

[h: status= input ( ".|Initiative Check||LABEL|SPAN=TRUE", "miscPos | 0 | Misc. bonus|TEXT|WIDTH=10", "miscNeg | 0 | Misc. penalty|TEXT|WIDTH=10" )] [h: abort(status)] [h: target=currentToken()] [h, Token(target): getProperty("Dexterity")] [h:abilityValue = Dexterity] [h: Die1 = 1d6] [h: Die2 = 1d6] [h: Die3 = 1d6] [h: Img1 = tblImage("Dice", Die1)] [h: Img2 = tblImage("Dice", Die2)] [h: Img3 = tblImage("DragonDice", Die3)] [h: focValue = json.fromList(DexFocus)] [h: focus = if(json.contains(focValue, "Initiative"), 1, 0)] [t: total = Die1 + Die2 + Die3 + abilityValue + miscPos + miscNeg + if(focus, 2, 0)] [h: tens = floor(total/10)] [h: tens = if(total > 9, tens, 0)] [h: subt = (tens * 10)] [h: ones = (total - subt)] [h: ttl1 = tblImage("Totaltens", tens)] [h: ttl2 = tblImage("Total", ones)] [h: parl = tblImage("Paren", 1)] [h: parr = tblImage("Paren", 2)] Initiative Test

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: ability = json.get(macro.args, 0)] [h: focus = json.get(macro.args, 1)] [h: focName = json.get(macro.args, 2)] [h,if(focName != "None"): displayFoc = "("+focName+")"; displayFoc = ""] [h: status= input ( ".|"+ability+" "+displayFoc+" Roll||LABEL|SPAN=TRUE", "miscPos | 0 | Misc. bonus", "miscNeg | 0 | Misc. penalty" )] [h: abort(status)] [h:abilityValue = getProperty(ability)] [h: Die1 = 1d6] [h: Die2 = 1d6] [h: Die3 = 1d6] [h: Img1 = tblImage("Dice", Die1)] [h: Img2 = tblImage("Dice", Die2)] [h: Img3 = tblImage("DragonDice", Die3)] [h: miscNeg = 0 - miscNeg] [h: total = Die1 + Die2 + Die3 + abilityValue + if(focus, 2, 0) + miscPos + miscNeg] [h: tens = floor(total/10)] [h: tens = if(total > 9, tens, 0)] [h: subt = (tens * 10)] [h: ones = (total - subt)] [h: ttl1 = tblImage("Totaltens", tens)] [h: ttl2 = tblImage("Total", ones)] [h: parl = tblImage("Paren", 1)] [h: parr = tblImage("Paren", 2)] [h: ttlchk = if(tens != 0, 20, 0)] [r: ability] [r:displayFoc] Test

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: dice = json.get(macro.args, 0)] [h: name = json.get(macro.args, 1)] [h: target=currentToken()] [h: status= input( ".|"+name+" Damage Roll||LABEL|SPAN=TRUE", "miscPos | 0 | Bonus", "miscNeg | 0 | Penalty", "diceadd | 0 | Bonus Dice" )] [h: abort(status)] [h: rollmath = eval(dice)] [h: bonusdice = 0] [h, COUNT(diceadd): bonusdice = bonusdice + 1d6] [h: total = rollmath + bonusdice + miscPos - miscNeg] [h: total = if(total < 1, 1, total)] [h: tens = floor(total/10)] [h: tens = if(total > 9, tens, 0)] [h: subt = (tens * 10)] [h: ones = (total - subt)] [h: Img1 = tblImage("Totaltens", tens)] [h: Img2 = tblImage("Total", ones)] [r: name] Damage Roll
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: WeaponDamage

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h,if(json.isEmpty(SpellBook)): mpList = ""; mpList = json.fields(SpellBook)]
[h:mpList = listAppend(mpList, "Add New")]
[h:status = input( "whichMP|"+mpList+"|Select Spell to Edit|LIST|SELECT=0 VALUE=STRING", "delete|0|Delete this Spell|CHECK")] [h:abort(status)]
[h,if(whichMP == "Add New"),CODE: { [spellname = "---"] [school = 0] [type = 0] [manacost = 0] [casttime = "---"] [tn = 0] [test = "None"] [desc = "None"] }; { [mpDetails = json.get(SpellBook, whichMP)] [school = json.get(mpDetails, "School")] [type = json.get(mpDetails, "Type")] [manacost = json.get(mpDetails, "ManaCost")] [casttime = json.get(mpDetails, "CastTime")] [tn = json.get(mpDetails, "TN")] [test = json.get(mpDetails, "Test")] [desc = json.get(mpDetails,"Desc")] [spellname = whichMP] }]
[if(whichMP != "Add New" && delete),CODE: { [h: SpellBook = json.remove(SpellBook, whichMP)] [r:whichMP] has been deleted. [h: continue=0] }; { [h: chkschool=0] [h: chkschool=if(school=="Entropy", 1, chkschool)] [h: chkschool=if(school=="Primal", 2, chkschool)] [h: chkschool=if(school=="Spirit", 3, chkschool)]
[h: chktype=0] [h: chktype=if(type=="Defense", 1, chktype)] [h: chktype=if(type=="Enchancement", 2, chktype)] [h: chktype=if(type=="Utility", 3, chktype)]
[h: status2=input( "spellname|"+spellname+"|Spell Name|TEXT|", "school|Creation, Entropy, Primal, Spirit|Magic School|LIST|SELECT="+chkschool+" VALUE=STRING", "type| Attack, Defense, Enhancement, Utility|Spell Type|LIST|SELECT="+chktype+" VALUE=STRING", "manacost|"+manacost+"|Mana Cost|TEXT", "casttime|"+casttime+"|Casting Time|TEXT", "tn|"+tn+"|Target Number|TEXT", "test|"+test+"|Test|TEXT", "desc|"+desc+"|Spell Description|TEXT", "continue|1|Continue adding more Spells (uncheck to stop adding Spell information)|CHECK" )] [h: abort(status2)]
[h: desc = if(desc=="", "None", desc)] [h: SpellNew = json.set("{}", "School", school, "Type", type, "ManaCost", manacost, "CastTime", casttime, "TN", tn, "Test", test, "Desc", desc)] [h: SpellBook = json.set(SpellBook, spellname, SpellNew)] }]
[h,if(continue),CODE: { [macro("UpdateSpells@this"):""] }; { [r, macro("SheetLoad@Lib:Test"): ""] }]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: UpdateSpells

[h,if(isNPC()): monPowers = json.fields(MonsterPowers); monPowers = "")] [h: Img1 = tblImage("Icons", 1)] [h: Img2 = tblImage("Icons", 2)] [h: Img3 = tblImage("Icons", 3)] [h: Img4 = tblImage("Icons", 4)] [h: Img5 = tblImage("Icons", 5)] [h: Imghide = tblImage("Totaltens", 0)] [r:Dexterity] [h,if(json.isEmpty(Weapons)): weaponList = ""; weaponList = json.fields(Weapons)] [foreach(wpn, weaponList, ""), code: { [h: wpnDetails = json.get(Weapons, wpn)] [h: wpnName = wpn] [h: wpnRollBonus = json.get(wpnDetails, "Bonus")] [h: wpnDmg = json.get(wpnDetails, "Damage")] [h,if(wpnRollBonus < 0): sign=""; sign="+"] }]

[r:macroLink("ABILITIES (FOCUSES)","UpdateTokenNpc@this","all","",currentToken())]
[r:Communication] [h: ability="Communication"][h: focus="0"] [h:jsonData = json.append("[]", ability, focus, "None")][r: macroLink("Communication", "AbilityRoll@this", "all",jsonData, currentToken())] [r,if(CommFocus != "None" && CommFocus != ""),CODE: { [h: ability="Communication"][h: focus="1"] ([r,foreach(focName,CommFocus): macroLink(focName, "AbilityRoll@this", "all", json.append("[]", ability, focus, focName), currentToken())]) };{}]
[r:Constitution] [h: ability="Constitution"][h: focus="0"] [h:jsonData = json.append("[]", ability, focus, "None")][r: macroLink("Constitution", "AbilityRoll@this", "all",jsonData, currentToken())] [r,if(ConFocus != "None" && ConFocus != ""),CODE: { [h: ability="Constitution"][h: focus="1"] ([r,foreach(focName,ConFocus): macroLink(focName, "AbilityRoll@this", "all", json.append("[]", ability, focus, focName), currentToken())]) };{}]

[h: ability="Dexterity"][h: focus="0"] [h:jsonData = json.append("[]", ability, focus, "None")][r: macroLink("Dexterity", "AbilityRoll@this", "all",jsonData, currentToken())] [r,if(DexFocus != "None"),CODE: { [h: ability="Dexterity"][h: focus="1"] ([r,foreach(focName,DexFocus): macroLink(focName, "AbilityRoll@this", "all", json.append("[]", ability, focus, focName), currentToken())]) };{}]
[r:Magic] [h: ability="Magic"][h: focus="0"] [h:jsonData = json.append("[]", ability, focus, "None")][r: macroLink("Magic", "AbilityRoll@this", "all",jsonData, currentToken())] [r,if(MagFocus != "None"),CODE: { [h: ability="Magic"][h: focus="1"] ([r,foreach(focName,MagFocus): macroLink(focName, "AbilityRoll@this", "all", json.append("[]", ability, focus, focName), currentToken())]) };{}]
[r:Perception] [h: ability="Perception"][h: focus="0"] [h:jsonData = json.append("[]", ability, focus, "None")][r: macroLink("Perception", "AbilityRoll@this", "all",jsonData, currentToken())] [r,if(PerFocus != "None"),CODE: { [h: ability="Perception"][h: focus="1"] ([r,foreach(focName,PerFocus): macroLink(focName, "AbilityRoll@this", "all", json.append("[]", ability, focus, focName), currentToken())]) };{}]
[r:Strength] [h: ability="Strength"][h: focus="0"] [h:jsonData = json.append("[]", ability, focus, "None")][r: macroLink("Strength", "AbilityRoll@this", "all",jsonData, currentToken())] [r,if(StrFocus != "None"),CODE: { [h: ability="Strength"][h: focus="1"] ([r,foreach(focName,StrFocus): macroLink(focName, "AbilityRoll@this", "all", json.append("[]", ability, focus, focName), currentToken())]) };{}]
[r:Willpower] [h: ability="Willpower"][h: focus="0"] [h:jsonData = json.append("[]", ability, focus, "None")][r: macroLink("Willpower", "AbilityRoll@this", "all",jsonData, currentToken())] [r,if(WillFocus != "None"),CODE: { [h: ability="Willpower"][h: focus="1"] ([r,foreach(focName,WillFocus): macroLink(focName, "AbilityRoll@this", "all", json.append("[]", ability, focus, focName), currentToken())]) };{}]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h,if(json.isEmpty(Weapons)): mpList = ""; mpList = json.fields(Weapons)] [h:mpList = listAppend(mpList, "Add New")] [h:status = input( ".|Weapon Update||LABEL|SPAN=TRUE", "whichMP|"+mpList+"|Select Weapon to Edit|LIST|SELECT=0 VALUE=STRING", "delete|0|Delete this weapon|CHECK")] [h:abort(status)] [h,if(whichMP == "Add New"),CODE: { [name = "---"] [group = 0] [ability = 0] [dmg = "1d6"] [strng = "---"] [lgrng = "---"] [rld = "---"] }; { [mpDetails = json.get(Weapons, whichMP)] [group = json.get(mpDetails, "Group")] [ability = json.get(mpDetails, "Ability")] [dmg = json.get(mpDetails, "Damage")] [strng = json.get(mpDetails, "Short Range")] [lgrng = json.get(mpDetails, "Long Range")] [rld = json.get(mpDetails, "Reload Time")] [name = whichMP] }] [if(whichMP != "Add New" && delete),CODE: { [h: Weapons = json.remove(Weapons, whichMP)] [r:whichMP] has been deleted. [h: continue=0] }; { [h: chkgroup=0] [h: chkgroup=if(group=="Bludgeons", 1, chkgroup)] [h: chkgroup=if(group=="Bows", 2, chkgroup)] [h: chkgroup=if(group=="Brawling", 3, chkgroup)] [h: chkgroup=if(group=="Heavy Blades", 4, chkgroup)] [h: chkgroup=if(group=="Light Blades", 5, chkgroup)] [h: chkgroup=if(group=="Spears", 6, chkgroup)] [h: chkgroup=if(group=="Staves", 7, chkgroup)] [h: chkability=0] [h: chkability=if(ability=="Dexterity", 1, chkability)] [h: chkrld=0] [h: chkrld=if(rld=="Minor",1, chkrld)] [h: status2=input( "name|"+name+"|Weapon Name|TEXT", "group|Axes, Bludgeons, Bows, Brawling, Heavy Blades, Light Blades, Spears, Staves|Weapon Group|LIST|SELECT="+chkgroup+" VALUE=STRING", "ability| Strength, Dexterity|Ability|LIST|SELECT="+chkability+" VALUE=STRING", "dmg|"+dmg+"|Weapon Damage|TEXT", ".|For Ranged Weapons Only||LABEL|SPAN=TRUE", ".| ||LABEL|SPAN=TRUE", "strng|"+strng+" |Short Range|TEXT", "lgrng|"+lgrng+"|Long Range|TEXT", "rld|Major, Minor|Reload Time|LIST|SELECT="+chkrld+" VALUE=STRING", "continue|1|Continue adding Weapons (uncheck to stop adding Weapons)|CHECK" )] [h: abort(status2)] [h: strng = if(strng=="", "---", strng)] [h: lgrng = if(lgrng=="", "---", lgrng)] [h: weaponNew = json.set("{}", "Group", group, "Ability", ability, "Damage", dmg, "Short Range", strng, "Long Range", lgrng,"Reload Time", rld)] [h: Weapons = json.set(Weapons, name, weaponNew)] }] [h,if(continue),CODE: { [macro("UpdateWeapons@Lib:Test"):""] }; { [h, macro("SheetLoad@Lib:Test"): ""] }]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: UpdateWeapons

net.rptools.CaseInsensitiveHashMap_-KeyV.value: Battle Axe, Heavy Mail, Medium Shield, and Throwing Axe.

{"Favored Stunts":{"pText":"Knock Prone and Mighty Blow."},"Magic resistance":{"pText":"A genlock gets a +2 bonus on ability tests to resist the effects of spells and other magical attacks."},"Talents":{"pText":"Armor Training (Journeyman) and Weapon and Shield Style (Novice)."},"Weapon Groups":{"pText":"Axes, Brawling, and Bludgeons."}}
Backpack, Travelers Garb, Waterskin, Wand, Quarterstaff, 10 Candles, Large Tent, 1 Week of Travel Rations

{"Arcane Lance":{"ctText":"Mages learn to focus magical power through a staff or wand. If you are holding a quarterstaff or a wand, you can make a special ranged attack that damages foes with a lance of magical energy. This is resolved like a normal ranged attack (so stunts are possible), but the attack roll is a Magic (Arcane Lance) test. An arcane lance has a range of 16 yards and inficts 1d6 + magic damage. It requires no mana points to make this attack."},"Magic Training":{"ctText":"--"},"Lore (Novice)":{"ctText":"You have studied hard. When you make a successful Cunning test with a lore focus, the GM should give you an extra piece of information on the topic. A lore focus is any Cunning focus with the word lore in it, such as Cultural Lore or Historical Lore. The GM determines the additional information and it may or may not be pertinent to the main question at hand."},"Read and Speak Trade Tongue":{"ctText":"--"},"Read Ancient Tevene":{"ctText":"--"}}

{"Heal":{"School":"Creation","Type":"Utility","ManaCost":"1-3","CastTime":"Major Action","TN":10,"Test":"None","Desc":"Your touch seals wounds and restores vigor to one wounded target. You can choose to spend up to 3 mana points when you cast this spell. For each mana point spent, the target gets back 1d6 Health. You can cast this on yourself"},"Shock":{"School":"Primal","Type":"Attack","ManaCost":4,"CastTime":"Major Action","TN":13,"Test":"Constitution (Stamina)","Desc":"Electricity arcs from your hands or the end of your staff, shocking enemies in a 6-yard by 6-yard area. Anyone in this area takes 1d6 + Magic penetrating damage. Targets that make a successful Constitution (Stamina) test vs. your Spellpower only take 1d6 penetrating damage."},"Weakness":{"School":"Entropy","Type":"Attack","ManaCost":3,"CastTime":"Major Action","TN":11,"Test":"Magic (Spirit)","Desc":"Your magic drains a visible enemy within 20 yards of energy, making him slower and more sluggish. The target suffers a 1 penalty to Strength and Dexterity and a 5 penalty to Speed for a number of rounds equal to the casting rolls Dragon Die. If the target makes a successful Magic (Spirit) test vs. your Spellpower, he only suffers the Speed penalty."}}

Arcane Lance, Magic Training, Mana Points
Lore (Novice)
Read and Speak Trade Tongue, Read Ancient Tevene
Weapon Groups: Brawling, Staves

{"Dark Vision":{"pText":"Revengers can see in the dark as if it were daylight. This does, however, make their eyes light sensitive. In actual daylight or other bright light, revengers suffer a 1 penalty to their Perception ability and all attack rolls."},"Favored Stunts":{"pText":"Lightning Attack and Mighty Blow"},"Quick Bite Stunt":{"pText":"A revenger can follow up a successful attack with its claws with a Quick Bite as a special stunt costing 2SP. The bit attack must be taken against the same target as the original attack. Rolling doubles on the bite attack roll does not generate more stunt points."}}
Backpack, Travelers Garb, Waterskin, Heavy Leather Armor, Short Sword, Brass Knuckles, Dagger, Longbow, 20 Arrows, Lock Picks, 6 Spikes, 20 Yards of Rope, 1 Week of Travel Rations

{"Backstab":{"ctText":"You can infict extra damage with a melee attack if you can strike an opponent from an unexpected direction. You must approach your opponent with a move action and win an opposed test of your dexterity (stealth) vs.your targets Perception (seeing). If you win the test, you can use your major action this round to backstab him. This is a melee attack with a +2 bonus to the attack roll that inficts +1d6 extra damage. You cannot backstab an enemy that you begin your turn adjacent to (but see the Bluff power at level 4)."},"Rogue's Armor":{"ctText":"You are at home in leather armor. You can ignore the Armor Penalty of leather armor altogether. It affects neither your Speed nor your Dexterity."},"Scouting (Novice)":{"ctText":"You can use the lay of the land to your advantage. If you fail a dexterity (stealth) test, you can re-roll it, but you must keep the results of the second roll."},"Read and Speak Trade Tongue":{"ctText":"--"}}
